change.changenote: Site "Batchelor South" was established by BC Reg 106/2012, effective May 29, 2012.
Site "Pacheedaht TSL Addition - Site 1" was established by BC Reg 108/2012, effective May 29, 2012.
Site "Battle Bluff" was established by BC Reg 195/2012, effective July 3, 2012.
Sites "Ditidaht TSL Addition - Site 1" and "Ditidaht TSL - Site 2" were established by BC Reg 233/2012, effective July 24, 2012.
Site "Mount Currie ATR" was established by BC Reg 268/2012, effective September 12, 2012.
Sites "Haisla Framework Area" and "Glimpse Lake Exchange Lands" were established by BC Reg 289/2012, effective September 28, 2012.

Sites "Crawford Bay Addition", "Jock and Cory Creeks Addition", "Kettle River Park Addition", "Kokanee Creek Park Addition", "Lardeau River Addition", "Slocan Lake Addition" and "West Arm Park Addition" were established by BC Reg 295/2012, effective October 11, 2012.
Site "Jumbo Glacier Resort Base Area" was established by BC Reg 296/2012, effective October 11, 2012.
Site "Thunder Mountain" was established by BC Reg 311/2012, effective October 26, 2012.
Sites Northern Caribou Sites, 1 to 12 and 38 to 40, were established by BC Reg 396/2012, effective December 11, 2012.
Sites "Nazko Industrial Park", "Marmot Lake South" and "Nazko Corner" were established by BC Reg 398/2012, effective December 11, 2012.
Site "Addition to Campbell River IR No. 11" was established by BC Reg 401/2012, effective December 11, 2012.

Sites "Balfour," "Bear Island", "Box Lake", "Castlegar – Site 1", "Castelgar – Site 2", "Clachnacudainn Creek", "Columbia Lake – Site 1", "Columbia Lake – Site 2", "Crackerjack Creek", "Crawford", "Crawford Bay", "Creston Central", "Creston South – Site 1", "Creston South – Site 2", "Creston South – Site 3", "Creston West", "Duncan Lake Island", "Elk River Spring", "Fernie", "Flathead", "Goat River – Site 1", "Goat River – Site 2", "Goat River – Site 3", "Goat River – Site 4", "Goat River – Site 5", "Golden", "Invermere", "Kingsgate", "Koocanusa – Site 1", "Koocanusa – Site 2", "Koocanusa – Site 3", "Koocanusa – Site 4", "Koocanusa – Site 5", "Koocanusa – Site 6", "La France Creek", "Lower Pedley Camp", "Madias-Tately", "Next Creek", "Paradise Camp", "Radium", "Shaw Creek", "Snowshoe Lake", "Tam O'Shanter", "West Arm – Site 1", "West Arm – Site 2", "Whitetail Lake", "Wigwam River" and "Woodbury Point" were established by BC Reg 8/2013, effective January 24, 2013.
Site "Water Reservoir Exchange Lands" was established by BC Reg 9/2013, effective January 28, 2013.
Site "1006158 Northern Caribou Site 11" was cancelled by BC Reg 50/2013, effective February 8, 2013.
Site "1006277 Northern Caribou Site 11" was established by BC Reg 50/2013, effective February 8, 2013.
Site "DuBose" was established by BC Reg 98/2013, effective March 1, 2013.
Sites "Hill 60", "Cowichan River ", "Community Forest", "Inwood", "Hillcrest", "Paldi", "Tzartlam" and "McLay Pit" were established by BC Reg 106/2013, effective March 14, 2013.
Sites "Old Man Lily" and "Columbia Lake Eastside Cultural Landscape" were established by BC Reg 199/2013, effective August 22, 2013.
Site "Grassy Point" was established by BC Reg 211/2013, effective October 11, 2013.
Sites "'Namgis Proposed Treaty Settlement Lands" Sites 1 through 26, were established by BC Reg 219/2013, effective October 28, 2013.
Site "NStQ Proposed Treaty Settlement Lands – Site 38" was established by BC Reg 220/2013, effective October 28, 2013.
Sites "Harper Lake" and "Lower Lake" were established by BC Reg 22/2014, effective February 24, 2014.
Sites "Stewart", "South Kaien Island", "Two Creeks" and "Kitimat" were established by BC Reg 35/2014, effective March 18, 2014.
Site "1006129 Haisla Framework Area" was renumbered as "1006383 Haisla Framework Area" by BC Reg 36/2014, effective March 18, 2014.
Site "Digby Island" was established by BC Reg 77/2014, effective May 22, 2014.
Sites "Scowban", "Nasago Gulf" and "Wil Milit" were established by BC Reg 78/2014, effective May 22, 2014.
Sites "Bear Mountain Terminal" and "Shell-Groundbirch Substation" were established by BC Reg 84/2014, effective May 22, 2014.
Sites "Northern Caribou Site 38", Northern Caribou Site 39" and "Northern Caribou Site 40" were cancelled by BC Reg 162/2014, effective September 3, 2014.
Site "1006377 Lower Lake" was cancelled by BC Reg 163/2014, effective September 3, 2014.
Sites "1006452 Fern Pasage" and "1006466 Lower Lake" were established by BC Reg 163/2014, effective September 3, 2014.
Site "1006519 Dunlevy Valley" was established by BC Reg 188/2014, effective October 14, 2014.
Sites "1006380 Two Creeks", "1006381 Kitimat" and "1006383 Haisla Framework Area" were cancelled by BC Reg 219/2014, effective November 26, 2014.
Sites "1006521 Westside Kitimat Arm" was established by BC Reg 219/2014, effective November 26, 2014.
Site "1006386 Hedley Tailings" was established by BC Reg 240/2014, effective December 17, 2014.
Site "1006525 Quinsam Exchange Land" was established by BC Reg 49/2015, effective March 26, 2015.
Sites "Tla'amin – Sites 1 through 4" were established by BC Reg 30/2016, effective February 29, 2016.
Site "1006438 Nasoga Gulf" was cancelled by BC Reg 85/2016, effective March 30, 2016.
Site "1006596 Nasoga Gulf" was established by BC Reg 85/2016, effective March 30, 2016.
Site "1005437 Lardeau River Addition" was cancelled by BC Reg 156/2016, effective June 21, 2016.
Site "1006671 Two Springs" was established by BC Reg 163/2017, effective August 29, 2017.
Site "1006673 Nanaimo River North - Site 1" was established by BC Reg 164/2017, effective August 29, 2017.
Site "1006672 Klappan - Zone A" was established by BC Reg 170/2017, September 14, 2017.
Sites "1005282 Punti Island Park", "1005307 Ts'il-os Park", "1005308 Redbrush Park" and "1005309 Patterson Lake Park" were cancelled by BC Reg 199/2017, effective November 6, 2017.
Site "1006276 DuBose" was cancelled by BC Reg 121/2018, effective June 19, 2018.

Sites "1006148 Northern Caribou Site 1", "1006149 Northern Caribou Site 2", "1006150 Northern Caribou Site 3", "1006151 Northern Caribou Site 4", "1006152 Northern Caribou Site 5", "1006153 Northern Caribou Site 6", "1006154 Northern Caribou Site 7", "1006155 Northern Caribou Site 8", "1006156 Northern Caribou Site 9", "1006157 Northern Caribou Site 10", "1006159 Northern Caribou Site 12" and "1006277 Northern Caribou Site 11" were cancelled by BC Reg 128/2019, effective June 17, 2019.

Sites "1006766 Pink Mountain 1", "1006767 Pink Mountain 2", "1006768 Pink Mountain 3", "1006769 Dancing Ground", "1006770 Red Creek North", "1006771 Red Creek South", "1006772 Big Camp", "1006773 Petersen’s Crossing", "1006774 Doig River West", "1006775 Doig River Northwest", "1006776 Doig River East", "1006777 Doig River South", "1006778 Mygosh", "1006779 KTP 1", "1006780 KTP 2", "1006786 Hudson Hope 1", "1006787 Hudson Hope 2", "1006788 Hudson Hope 3", "1006789 Stewart Lake North", "1006790 Stewart Lake East", "1006791 Tumbler Ridge 1", "1006792 Tumbler Ridge 2", "1006793 Tumbler Ridge 3", "1006794 Hole in the Wall", "1006795 Cameron Lakes", "1006796 Hidden Lake", "1006797 Three Lakes", "1006798 Moberly Lake North", "1006799 Moberly Lake North Shore", "1006800 Moberly Lake South Shore", "1006801 Dokkie South", "1006802 Dokkie North", "1006803 Chetwynd Southwest", "1006804 Chetwynd West", "1006805 Chetwynd East" and "1006806 Chetwynd Northeast" were established by BC Reg 254/2019, effective December 2, 2019.

Sites "1006820 Sikanni Chief", "1006821 Stewart Lake", "1006822 Trapper Creek", "1006825 Moose Lake", "1006826 Murray River", "1006827 Kelly Lake", "1006828 Tumbler Ridge", "1006829 Hole in the Wall", "1006832 Hudson Hope 4" and "1006863 Hudson's Hope Industrial" were established by BC Reg 111/2020, effective May 27, 2020.
Site "1006892 Hole in the Wall Park Addition" was established by BC Reg 286/2020, effective December 17, 2020.
Site "1006082 Jumbo Glacier Resort Base Area" was cancelled by BC Reg 141/2021, effective May 31, 2021.
Site "1006909 Two Springs Park Addition" was established by BC Reg 141/2021, effective May 31, 2021.
Sites "1005942 Pacheedaht TSL Addition – Site 1", "1005982 Ditidaht TSL Addition – Site 1" and "1005983 Ditidaht TSL – Site 2" were cancelled by BC Reg 20/2023, effective February 2, 2023.
